mapper.select: SELECT j.`id` AS id, p.`id` AS personnelId, p.`name` AS name, p.`sex` AS sex, p.`agency_name` AS agencyName, p.`identification_no` AS identificationNo, j.`positional_title_name` AS positionalTitleName, j.`positional_title_type` AS positionalTitleType, j.`positional_level_level`AS positionalLevelLevel, J.`positional_title_time` AS positionalTitleTime, c.`modify_type` AS `modifyType`, c.`new_positional_title_name` AS newPositionalTitleName, c.`new_positional_level_level` AS newPositionalLevelLevel, c.`new_positional_title_time` AS newPositionalTitleTime, C.`attachment_id` AS attachmentId, c.`status` AS STATUS FROM org_personnel_positional_info AS j LEFT JOIN org_personnel AS p ON p.id=j.`personnel_id` LEFT JOIN complaint_positional_title AS c ON j.id=c.id WHERE p.is_delete = 0 AND j.id=#{id}

SELECT j.`id` AS id, p.`id` AS personnelId, j.`positional_title_name` AS oldPositionalTitleName, j.`positional_level_level`AS oldPositionalLevelLevel, J.`positional_title_time` AS oldPositionalTitleTime, j.`attachments` AS oldAttachmentId, c.`new_positional_title_name` AS newPositionalTitleName, c.`new_positional_level_level` AS newPositionalLevelLevel, c.`new_positional_title_time` AS newPositionalTitleTime, c.`attachment_id` AS newAttachmentId FROM org_personnel_positional_info AS j LEFT JOIN org_personnel AS p ON p.id=j.`personnel_id` LEFT JOIN complaint_positional_title AS c ON j.id=c.id WHERE p.is_delete = 0 and c.id=#{id}
